Questions.Label: What sectors will your organisation offer apprenticeship training in?
Questions.QuestionBodyText: We'll ask you who the most experienced employees are in your selected sectors - including any sector specific qualifications they may have.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us what sectors your organisation will offer apprenticeship training in

Pages.Title: 2. Add the most experienced employee for each sector

Validations.Name: MaxLength
